name: Gene Breaker
description:
You are part of a clone army created in test tubes. Every soldier was supposed to have the same goal, to fight for the master. But you were different. Part of your genetic sequence was transcribed incorrectly and you gained free will. Now you must fight the rest of the clone army to escape this underground lab and carve out your own destiny.

Move - WASD
Attack - J or K

Gene Breaker was made in 100 hours for the LAJam 2022 - You are your Own Enemy

Turboash - sound design, VFX, lighting
Martiniano Marelli - concept art, 3d modeling, level design
Scriptorious - code, game design
Midrule - music
